name: File Upload
description: A component for uploading files with drag-and-drop support and progress indication.

props.name: accept
props.description: Comma-separated list of file types that the upload accepts.

props.name: multiple
props.description: If true, allows multiple files to be selected.

props.name: onUpload
props.description: Callback function when files are uploaded.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the upload component will be disabled.
